title: 请问word又是啥吗梗
author: Wang_Funny
txt_content:
本人经常在
自己群里面看到
别人发word天
啥的
这是新“我的”梗吗
word世界

replies.author: Wang_Funny
replies.txt_content: 这个梗 word这个梗...

replies.author: a1243669195a
replies.txt_content: 世界。。。

replies.author: a1243669195a
replies.txt_content: 沃德天 我的天

replies.author: a1243669195a
replies.txt_content: 与世界谐音相似 所以叫Word
我的天啊，这不会是【我的天】把

replies.author: 你好大大
replies.txt_content: word 不是 世界吗

replies.author: 青木源
replies.txt_content: Office知道么？你上课用的PPT，Word等都是Office包里的办公软件，Word的谐音我的例如“厉害了word哥”，并非world……更不是世界的意思

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
承让了word的弟！  2333  





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."
